mapper.select: select * from review where book_no = #{ book_no } and deleted ='0' order by re_no DESC
mapper.insert: insert into review (re_no, rate, book_no, title, content, id ) values ( review_seq.nextval, #{ rate }, #{book_no}, #{ title }, #{ content }, #{ id } )
mapper.update: update review set rate=#{rate}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, writedate=sysdate where re_no=#{re_no}
